#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
  int t, n, key, num = 10001, count = 0, testnum, testcount;
  cin >> t;
  while (t > 0) {
    t--;
    // reset for new test case
    num = 10001, count = 0;
    cin >> n;

    // take input numbers
    int nums[n];
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
      cin >> nums[i];
    }

    // check for num and count 
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
      testnum = nums[i];
      testcount = 1;
      for (int j = i+1; j < n; j++) if (nums[j] == nums[i]) testcount++;
      if (testcount > count || (testcount == count && testnum < num)) {
        num = testnum;
        count = testcount;
      }
    }
    cout << num << ' ' << count << endl;
  }  
  return 0;
}
